Move Over Khans! IMDb Declares Deepika Padukone As Its Top Indian Star Of 2018
Move Over Khans! IMDb Declares Deepika Padukone As Its Top Indian Star Of 2018
She might have done just one film this year, but Bollywood's Queen Deepika Padukone is topping every year-end list this year.
After topping Forbes List, Deepika Padukone has been named the top Indian star of 2018, beating her Om Shanti Om co-actor, Shah Rukh Khan, according to leading global movie website IMDb.
SLB Films
On Tuesday, IMDb unveiled the 2018 Top 10 Stars of Indian Cinema list. The list was derived using data from IMDbPro STARmeter rankings, which are based on page views of more than 250 million monthly visitors to the platform, read a statement.
Following Padukone in the list by a close margin is Shah Rukh Khan, who is gearing up for the release of the film Zero on December 21. On the third spot is Thugs of Hindostan actor Aamir Khan, followed by Fanney Khan star Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Race 3’s Salman Khan and Katrina Kaif.

A new entrant in this list is Sacred Games’ Kubbra Sait.
Agencies
Other actors who are included in the list are Irrfan Khan, the ‘omnipresent’ Radhika Apte, and Gold actor Akshay Kumar.
Talking about Padukone's credentials this year, Neha Gureja, Head of International for IMDb was quoted in an IANS report saying,
"Deepika Padukone's strong performance in this year's Padmaavat pushed her into the top spot on the 2018 IMDb Top Stars of Indian Cinema list."
Talking about other Bollywood actors who made a cut in the list, she added,
Pinterest
"Radhika Apte delighted audiences this year, appearing in two of the IMDb Top Indian Movies of 2018 - AndhaDhun (which ranked number 1) and Pad Man (ranked number 6). Akshay Kumar, the bold protagonist in Pad Man rounds out the Top Stars list at number 10."
(With IANS inputs)
title: Move Over Khans! IMDb Declares Deepika Padukone As Its Top Indian Star Of 2018
description: Deepika Padukone is IMDb’s top Indian star of 2018, leaves Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan, Aamir Khan behind International film website, IMDb has named Deepika Padukone as the biggest Indian star of 2018. Deepika, who starred in Padmaavat earlier in the year, has beat out Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan, Aamir Khan and Akshay Kumar.
